title: 30 Day Spiritual Detox | iHeart
description: For the next 30 days we are going on a journey into a spiritual detox, meaning a fast for the spirit and that detox for the spirit, for the next 30 days I will be speaking each day to remind us where we are and where we're going in this 30 day detox, there are many people that are starting a fast and they are fasting away from things and people and places, but we are fasting on a detox level for the spirit, and connecting the mind and our thought pattern to be spiritually detoxed. Join me join us in this 30 day detox, you can also stay in touch with me by text my cell phone number is 1 (224)479-0411. You can also register on this number so that we can stay connected and I can send you free copy of one of my books when you register, God bless

If you can never get enough true crime... Congratulations, you've found your people. New episodes come out every Monday for free, with 1-week early access when you join Amazon Music or 1-week early and ad-free for Wondery+ subscribers "SmartLess" with Jason Bateman, Sean Hayes, & Will Arnett is a podcast that connects and unites people from all walks of life to learn about shared experiences through thoughtful dialogue and organic hilarity. A nice surprise: in each episode of SmartLess, one of the hosts reveals his mystery guest to the other two. What ensues is a genuinely improvised and authentic conversation filled with laughter and newfound knowledge to feed the SmartLess mind.
